category: Sports Instructor Qualification Committee Regulations/Article 8 (Dismissal of members)
contents: Article 8 (Dismissal of a member) The chairman may dismiss a member if any of the following applies. 1. When the person wishes to submit a resignation letter. 2. When it is determined that it is difficult for the member to perform his or her duties due to illness, overseas business trip, or other reasons that make it difficult to attend for a long period of time. 3. An act that damages the dignity of the member, such as violating positive law. If it is deemed inappropriate to perform duties due to
